name: Suntide Island Beach Club

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I are frequent travelers to the Caribbean, often making use of our timeshare exchanges further south. Our exchange this week at Suntide was a new experience at least for me since she owned a week at a very similar facility 3 resorts to the north and had had a lot of experience with the area for ten years running in the 90's. I have to say that I was very impressed with this small (41 unit) property. Some critics have written that it's harshly managed and I will note that management here is ... strict about rules, but it works since the place is unfailingly clean, quiet and well run. The clientele here is mixed in ages, but geezers predominate. (I'm 65, so I qualify!). The design is a bit dated and single bedroom suites can be compact with mostly queen-size beds and a combo living/dining room and kitchen area. But the layout is efficient and with a lovely beach 50 yards away, and a beautiful pool and huge hot tub, why would you spend a lot of time in your room?! Incidentally, while the layout is dated, the pool, hot tub and all of the fixed assets here are either new or recently refurbished.
reviews.title: Small, quiet gem on the beach!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The locale is perfect. About 2 miles from St. Armand's circle - certainly walkable. The beach is beautiful (a bit shelly since it's not raked often, but that's no biggy!). We took long walks both north and south on the beach that were wonderful.
reviews.title: Just the two of us.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The people here were all friendly and the facilities served our purposes completely. And I for one welcomed a little "management discipline" if it makes my vacation better!
reviews.title: Great Stay - Relaxation!!!

reviews.text: (Incidentally, if you want "new" and a bit more rowdy, the Ritz Carlton 4 resorts south might suit you, but you'll certainly come away a lot poorer!)
reviews.title: Bad Rap

reviews.text: My wife and I had a great time at this resort. We were there last week of Sept. into first of Oct. Very clean unit. Small resort, very quiet which is what we were looking for. Beach is beautiful, we use the gas grills a lot and enjoy the Armands circle area. This was our 3rd visit to this resort in the past 3 years and we will go back.
reviews.title: Our condo was Robbed

aka: Suntide Island Beach Club Hotel Sarasota
